sentences.en: In her younger days my mother had been a successful fashionwear saleswoman.
sentences.cn: 我妈妈年轻时曾经是个成功的时装销售员。

sentences.en: It was no coincidence either that she a very good saleswoman.
sentences.cn: 她成不了一位优秀的推销员也就不是巧合了.

sentences.en: Saleswoman: And here's your change, ￥10. Thank you. Welcome next time.
sentences.cn: 这个是找你的零钱, 10元, 谢谢你. 欢迎下次继续光临.
售货员: 需要帮忙 吗 ?

sentences.en: Saleswoman: I don't think it will fit you.
sentences.cn: 店员: 我想它不合适你.

sentences.en: Saleswoman: No. Just look in again next week.
sentences.cn: 女售货员: 不用,下周来看看就行.

sentences.en: Saleswoman: There are certified and inspected domestic brands, like this one.
sentences.cn: 售货员: 国产奶粉也有可以放心的, 比如这个牌子.

sentences.en: SALESWOMAN: Well, you made a good choice. Coming to us, I mean.
sentences.cn: 专柜小姐: 你找对了, 我的意思是来找我们.
女售货员: 你穿几号?

sentences.en: Should you need further information , please contact saleswoman directly.
sentences.cn: 如若您需要酒店进一步的协助, 请随时与销售员联系.

sentences.en: The man became embroiled this time with a saleswoman.
sentences.cn: 这回那男子跟一名女售货员好上了.

sentences.en: The saleswoman helped her on with it , and , by accident, it fitted perfectly.
sentences.cn: 女店员帮她穿上这衣服, 恰巧非常合身.

sentences.en: The saleswoman raised an eyebrow skeptically; her voice sharpened.
sentences.cn: 女推销员疑惑的扬扬眉毛,提高了嗓门.

sentences.en: The saleswoman set aside the coat for the fat lady.
sentences.cn: 女售货员给这位胖女士留下了一件外套.

trans.tran_en: a woman whose job is selling things
